category: National Sports Competition Regulations/Article 10 (Rights regarding competition names, etc.)
contents: Article 10 (Rights regarding competition name, etc.) The Sports Council owns exclusive intellectual property rights regarding the competition name, competition symbol mark, competition motto (excluding the competition motto of the National Life Sports Festival), and competition price, and others may use them. If you wish to do so, you must obtain prior approval from the Sports Council. However, the Sports Association may grant rights to the Organizing Committee for a set period of time. Revised 2022. 1. 24.
